channel.title: Substance Designer on Petfactory
channel.description: Recent content in Substance Designer on Petfactory

item.title: Substance Designer - notes
item.description: Tips UV To view the UVs in the 2D view 3D view Scene > Display UVs in 2D view UDIM If you import a mesh that only have one uv tile but this tile is not the 1001 udim. The baker will not produce any result. What you can do is to select the mesh and in the attribute editor set the is_udim to true
